seniority_level.evidence: Title indicates Data Engineer-BI, responsibilities include end-to-end feature development and root cause analysis, but no specific years mentioned and Master's degree required suggests early-mid career level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' with focus on Tableau, SQL, dashboard development, and analytics

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary focus on Tableau Desktop & Server, SQL, Oracle, Hive for dashboard development and analytics - clear business intelligence specialization

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include 'lead IBM into the future', 'manage end to end feature development', and 'manage debugging' suggesting technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud providers mentioned - technologies (Tableau, SQL, Oracle, Hive) could be on-premise or cloud-based but no cloud services referenced

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all in job posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on Tableau dashboards, SQL queries, and analytics suggests batch processing for reporting rather than real-time streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned - role focuses on analytics and dashboard development rather than pipeline orchestration

storage_layer.evidence: Technologies mentioned (SQL, Oracle, Hive) suggest traditional data warehousing and database systems for structured data analytics

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite work model specified for Pune, Maharashtra, India location - requires being in Pune region

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India - onsite role focused on India timezone

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in Pune with no remote work option mentioned - candidates would need to relocate to Pune area

h1b_friendly.evidence: India-based role with no visa sponsorship mentioned - H1B is US-specific visa not applicable to Indian positions

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: India-based role - OPT/CPT are US student visa programs not applicable to Indian positions

citizenship_required.evidence: No specific citizenship requirements mentioned for India-based role - standard work authorization would apply

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employee position at IBM with benefits structure suggests W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'a limitless career path with the world's technology leader' suggesting growth opportunities but no specific career tracks mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: Working in IBM Consulting Client Innovation Centers and collaborating with teams suggests mentorship through collaboration, but no formal program mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No specific promotion or advancement path mentioned in job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or role changes within IBM

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have technical skills (Tableau, SQL) and Master's degree requirement, but 'Preferred Experience: None' suggests openness to candidates

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined Data Engineer-Business Intelligence role focused on Tableau, analytics, and dashboard development

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements (Tableau, SQL, communication skills) are reasonable for data engineer role without obvious inflation
